pkgmetadata.longdescription: L1 Regularized Regression (Lasso) Solver using the Cyclic Coordinate Descent Algorithm aka Lasso Shooting // L1 regularized regression (Lasso) solver using the Cyclic Coordinate Descent algorithm aka Lasso Shooting is fast. This implementation can choose which coefficients to penalize. It support coefficient-specific penalties and it can take X'X and X'y instead of X and y.
